name: Elm
description:
EARLY ACCESS DEMO

Craft, slash, and plunder! Elm is a dungeon crawler with randomly generated elements. Clear your way through the dark forests and conquer the blighted pine.

Current features:
  • Procedurally generated world
  • Combat with a variety of mobs
  • Crafting and cooking system
  • Inventory and chest system
  • Skills and abilities system
  • Item gathering
  • Boss battle 
Coming soon:
  • QoL enhancements
  • More biomes and bosses
  • New mob types
  • New foods and craftable items
  • More weapon upgrades
  • More skills/abilities
  • Story features
Open to comments and suggestions

By releasing this demo we want players to test the mechanics and features of our game and hopefully offer constructive feedback.

CONTROLS

(Because this is only a demo we don't have a tutorial yet. Here are a few basic controls)

  • WASD - movement
  • space - dash
  • esc - pause menu
  • E - open inventory
  • 1234 - switch tools
  • lmb - use current tool
  • rmb - use item
  • click to interact if object has a white outline
